Service Cloud
What’s Service?
Set Up Service Cloud Basics
Design and Optimize the Agent Experience
Deflect Cases with Self-Service
Knowledge
Create Workflow Actions for Knowledge

Knowledge actions are templates that link a workflow action to an article type. When knowledge actions are enabled, you can use them to link article types to specific workflow article actions, such as publishing.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience
Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Editions with Service Cloud.

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To enable Salesforce Knowledge Actions: Customize Application

From Setup, enter Knowledge Action in the Quick Find box. Select Knowledge Action. Click New Knowledge Action.
Select the article type for the action. Enter a unique name for the knowledge action. Select the type of action you want to apply to the article type. Enter a description. Click Save.

The Knowledge Action detail page appears showing you the rules and approval processes that use the knowledge action.
When you’re ready to use the knowledge action in an approval or workflow process, click Activate on the Knowledge Action detail page.
title: Creating Workflow Actions in Service Cloud
